name: Trail Slash
description:
Game created for SGDA Summer Game Jam 2021

Theme : Leaving Behind A Trace

Controls

WASD - Movement

Right Click - Dash/Place Marker

Left Click - Slash

How to Play

Place markers with right click and slash enemies caught between the markers with left click. You can Dash by holding a movement key and right clicking. Dashing makes you invincible to projectiles and enemies for a brief moment. Slashing multiple enemies in 1 slash will give more score.
